feat: implement markdown parser module

- Add ParseMarkdown\(\) to extract character abilities from markdown
- Parse sections: Traits, Actions, Bonus Actions, Reactions
- Extract abilities using **Name.** Description pattern
- Split by ## headers and paragraph breaks
- Preserve text formatting \(italic, bold\)
- Ignore unknown sections
- Handle empty sections gracefully

- TestParseMarkdown_SingleTrait
- TestParseMarkdown_MultipleSections

EOF
\)")

- Validate dice types \(d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20, d100\)

- TestConvertDiceRolls_SaveDC
